name: A Crappy Game
description:
This game was created for the "Unspeakable Jam." It's specifically an attempt at an unspeakable game while not using any foul language or imagery.

The only image of poop in this game is that sweet custom poop emoji present in the cover.  That's the grossest image in the game.

There are no "bad words" in this game. I would like to say there was a lot of "potty humor" in the game, but anyone that has pooped themself in a social setting knows that it is not a laughing matter.

This is a short game, at just 1,207 words. It does, however, have its own four track instrumental OST and was inspired by a free lo-fi acapella album.
